about.description:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 9+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, Vue, and TypeScript.

Worked across financial, automotive, travel, e-commerce, and education sectors, specializing in modern architectures (SSR, Microfrontends, BFF), design systems, and complex user experiences.

Currently based in Lisbon/Portugal.

flowsign.name: FlowSign
flowsign.description: Digital signature platform for electronic document management and workflow automation.

abconsindcon.name: Abcon Sindcon Website
abconsindcon.description: Construction industry union association website with member services and news.

likeappro.name: LikeAppro
likeappro.description: Social approval and engagement platform for content validation and workflow management.

previbayer.name: Previ Bayer Brazil
previbayer.description: Private pension fund management system for Bayer employees in Brazil.

nespresso.name: Nespresso Professional
nespresso.description: Developed shipping module with carrier integration in cart and order return module in user admin dashboard.

atvos.name: Atvos Corporate Website
atvos.description: Corporate website for renewable energy and biofuels company.

novonor.name: Novonor News
novonor.description: News portal and corporate communications platform for Novonor group.

vexty.name: Vexty Investment Reports
vexty.description: Interactive investment reports and financial data visualization platform.

mercedesBenz.description: Part of the team responsible for the Search & Results experience on the Mercedes-Benz website. Developed and maintained core features using TypeScript, Vue.js and SSR, improving performance and scalability.

skrolCapital.description: Developed two full-stack AI-driven products: Investor Discovery Platform (Laravel, React, Python) and FlowSign AI Document Signing Platform (Laravel, React, Next.js). Led product architecture and end-to-end delivery.

aubay.description: Contributed to new internal system modules for Millennium BCP Bank using React, Redux, and Node.js. Built components for enterprise design system in Agile environment.

cvc.description: Enhanced User Dashboard for millions of customers (flights, hotels, rentals). Key contributor in redesigning CVC Login System with microfrontend adoption. Built BFF endpoints with Node.js.

netshoes.description: Created marketing admin tools (Coupons, Clusters, Labels). Built promotions engine reducing processing time from 48h to 2h. Implemented promotion logic across homepage, cart, and checkout.

rperformance.description: Led overhaul of e-learning platform for Santander Bank. Refactored architecture separating backend (Laravel) and frontend (React). Improved system scalability and performance.

jota3w.description: Developed frontend solutions for enterprise clients. Built custom WordPress templates. Integrated Nespresso APIs and DocuSign. Developed shipping module for Nespresso. Led intranet development for Assaí supermarkets.
